column5:
I feel the same way about my girlfriend.  I just am so in love with her and have been thinking about marriage and it‚Äôs only 8 months.  I was like what‚Äôs wrong with me?

But then I realized. I‚Äôm in love with someone who loves me. What‚Äôs so wrong with that?
Men who think this way.   You‚Äôre douchebags

It‚Äôs hard not wanting to upset people.  I‚Äôve thought about breaking up with my gf because my dad is so upset.   
But ultimately we can only control our own happiness and do our best to present ourselves happy and healthy to others.
So sorry for your loss. It will be a year for my mom on Tuesday. Hope you‚Äôre feeling closure.
HAppy birthday. I‚Äôm having my first one without my mom in June.  I‚Äôm really sorry for you loss. ‚ù§Ô∏è
Love this.
You look really good!  I question if I look gay all the time.  (I think you do).   Girls never hit on me either.  I usually have to make the first move.
Shout out to southeast mass folks!
Wooo! Congrats.  My first thought was that dating is dating. Just with someone much softer and idk. For me it just felt right saying women.  Have fun!

Me too. It‚Äôs been almost a year for me. But hey I feel like I‚Äôve done a good job. You‚Äôve made it 3 months so far.  And we have this community and eachother.  Keep reaching out.  Your mom looked so sweet ‚ù§Ô∏è sorry for your loss

I‚Äôm 27 and I lost my mom this year.  I was surprised after I told people I found others who‚Äôs parents have died too. There‚Äôs a lot of us.  I‚Äôm so sorry about your dad. It‚Äôs really hard.  Come here and vent anytime. Feel free to message me!
I almost cried
After my mom died I couldn‚Äôt sleep for months.  It‚Äôs been 11 months and I just got a bout of insomnia this week.  I‚Äôm really sorry you‚Äôre going through that
I totally agree.  My mom was 65 and was diagnosed at 60. It‚Äôs like none of this should have ended up this way.    I wish I had a smash room or something
She looks like an awesome person.  I‚Äôm so sorry for you‚Äôre loss. I‚Äôm really angry my mom died from dementia.  I think it‚Äôs a effect from grief.   Hang in there

Thanks so much. I‚Äôm so sorry about your dad. Not having a funeral must have been really hard.  I talk to her all the time but haven‚Äôt felt her around me much lately. Writing a letter is interesting.  I‚Äôve been just really lethargic and feeling sorry for myself. Time to do something more productive!
I kind of agree with this
I think it was like a week and a half
I definitely feel like I am dealing with ptsd symptoms.  It will mend with time and get a Little easier.  Still rough days sometimes though.
I‚Äôm so sorry. I just lost my mom last year in May.  It is a lot of pain but use this as a community to vent.  It‚Äôs really helped me.  Good luck on your journey.
You‚Äôre not alone
I mean if you are young call social services?  Would you rather go to a group home or something?

If you‚Äôre even saying someone raped you you should not be with them. It‚Äôs not your fault and if you don‚Äôt want to be with him don‚Äôt feel guilt about it. That‚Äôs your right to not want someone and feeling guilty is not an excuse.

I‚Äôm 27 and just came out to my very catholic fam.  I think my dad kind of new but all my female best friends weren‚Äôt suspect to my other fam. They had no idea. So don‚Äôt get freaked out by that. It wasn‚Äôt the easiest and me and my dad just don‚Äôt acknowledge it since I told him.  Feels good to get it off my chest.
I‚Äôm so sorry. I wish all of you peace and positive thoughts as much as possible.
That‚Äôs such a cute picture!  You can feel the love between you. Let the guilt free.  You loved him and he loved you.  I‚Äôm so sorry for your loss
So sorry for your loss.  A death of someone close is never easy. I lost my mom last year to dementia. I‚Äôm 27. Give yourself some time.

Agreed.  And be kind to yourself.  You‚Äôve at least made one really good decision to help yourself. And you‚Äôve helped me today too. 


Thanks for the support!
Thanks so much.  Yah I‚Äôm feeling awesome about the support.  Makes me feel like I can definitely do this
That‚Äôs a cool idea actually
Thanks so much.  You too!
Happy birthday!  That‚Äôs awesome!
Thanks so much. Same to you!
Thanks for sharing. Sorry about your pup. It‚Äôs funny what connections can be made huh?
Thanks so much! Good knowing we are in it together. Good luck on your journey and I‚Äôm really sorry about your mom
Thanks so much!
I decided this today too!! We are in it together
Nice! Good luck!  I am going to throw the rest of mine out too. I agree it‚Äôs a good time to stop making excuses!
Agreed!!  I just want to feel calm she happy but that‚Äôs not in the cards rn.  Here to talk if you want to talk about what‚Äôs bothering you!
I watch tv and then sometimes can‚Äôt sleep for a while. Currently in this situation now.
Thanks. I appreciate it. I‚Äôm definitely okay  ‚ù§Ô∏è

My mom died a year ago in May and I feel really alone. I feel like people are talking to their family and I don‚Äôt have my mom to talk to. I have other people but my dads not talking to me.... it‚Äôs just not the same. So I get it

I‚Äôm having a tough time with that too.  It seems like you just went through a lot.  Maybe did now an online community? And then let this time give you a moment of peace to chill after everything has happened?  It seems like you have a lot going on that your fam could have supported you with.  I‚Äôm sorry about your losses.  I miss my mom and my grandma everyday. Especially now.  It‚Äôs hard to feel like your connected when you‚Äôre literally told to distance yourself.  Good luck!

I really like the use of the more than symbol. Is that representing different dialogue?  I think it adds a architectural element. 

I would look at the few lines around economy is at a downward spiral.  I love those lines I‚Äôm im thinking you can maybe delete some words like kinda to give it more of a punch.  Especially the rhyming.
Yah.  I do that all the time.

I think just being honest with her and just being with her sometimes is helpful. She‚Äôs feeling tough too but everyone deals with things differently. Thanks so much, it is hard but it made me realize how many people are there for me too. Groups like these, writing, and talking about it with friends was really helpful.

My mom died at 65 last year. I had a lot of trouble sleeping. But it got better within about 4 months. It does get easier but there‚Äôs still a lot of pain there. Sending you good vibes. I‚Äôm really sorry for this major loss.

I agree with the last comment to break it up a bit. But not too much because those long paragraphs are pretty stagnant. But the stagnation of her at the window matches.  I would say break up the lines in a way could create tension. Laborious breathing. Awkward pauses? I‚Äôd try some of those. 

Good luck!
I cried as soon as I listened to this. I‚Äôve been really stressed and feeling really alone. Thank you.
I‚Äôm so sorry and I‚Äôm here if you need to talk.  Grief isn‚Äôt easy and you‚Äôre going through it during an impossible time.
You‚Äôre all good! I enjoy the long response. Good luck with the collages.
My moms comes back as a butterfly.  When she was dying I told her to give me a sign and now I see butterflies everywhere
I am so sorry. I couldn‚Äôt imagine. But all I can say is I‚Äôm so sorry for your loss.
Writing and painting.   I‚Äôm having a hard time too though

It definitely does.  My mom died last May. I cried all the time and felt like life wouldn‚Äôt be right again. But now I feel like I can move on. Some days are better than others but I don‚Äôt have the anxiety and utter sadness that I did.

I don‚Äôt see my mom in dreams either. But I see butterflies all the time and I think that‚Äôs how I see her. I do talk out loud to her all the time too.

Good luck! It‚Äôs a long journey
I‚Äôm having a really hard time too. Staying home is like my nightmare. If you want to chat feel free to DM me!
I‚Äôm having a really hard time being inside for a long time!   Tough stuff
Thanks so much!  Yes. Cleaning the house and doing dishes is what I needed.  Thanks. I needed someone to validate my choice.
One step at a time!  I feel like it is really easy to get into a mode but try to not smoke tomorrow. I‚Äôm having some trouble day 3 and I‚Äôm going to an MA meeting. Maybe check it out?

My mom passed away in May but her birthday was in feb.  I‚Äôm 27. It just really sucks and I feel really alone on top of it too.  It‚Äôs a hard pain to go through. Hope you feel a little more heard and supported.  I‚Äôm proud of you for even dealing with grief it‚Äôs a big deal.
How much would a normal budget be? Like 250 per quilt?
Idk if you already said this but what your company did you go with? Did you go upper or lower?  I am going in April and trying to decide.

So sorry for your loss.  Today I was sitting with my girlfriend on the steps on the Lincoln memorial and I just started crying because so many things are just so different than I thought they would be.  And it‚Äôs just a lot of getting used to. Things can be really good but it‚Äôs always just going to be not how it was supposed to be.
My mom comes back to me as a butterfly.  Beautiful reminder of them.

I‚Äôm on day 1 and still really struggling. I think just remembering how good you feel not on it is the best thing for me.   

Good luck and you have our support!
I ended up not smoking for the rest of the day and haven‚Äôt smoked today.  Thanks for the support. I really needed it!
Thanks for sharing. I defensively relate.
Sorry about your mom. Nice not to be alone though!
Just don‚Äôt be a douche. I‚Äôm not looking for updates.  And comment with something helpful.
Thanks. I needed that.  It‚Äôs just really hard to be like wow he really does hate me I guess?
Thanks!
It was a typo I meant booked. and you should just not comment rather than calling someone stupid.
Did you book a lot of things ahead of time or are you going with the flow?
That‚Äôs how I try to remember my mom too. I struggle with that versus her sick and dying. Beautiful photo!!!
You too!  I feel like like you said it‚Äôs one step at a time.
I‚Äôm on day 6. It‚Äôs really hard I think.  We can do it!!! It‚Äôs a big lifestyle change. Like what do I do when I get home from work? When I‚Äôm bored?
Right?!
Hell yah!!! You got a lesbian teacher right here!!
I didn‚Äôt know they had those... I‚Äôm going to check it out.
Thanks so much!! Will join
It went really well!!! I taught a good class and the department head couldn‚Äôt come to the class to observe so it was really chill. Worried for no reason!
I feel you. My mom died 7 months ago. I have an interview today and wish she was here to cheer me on.  We are here for you! Sorry it really sucks.
Very cool!! I wanna get a geometric tatoo for my mom.  You‚Äôre inspiring!
Sorry for yours too. ‚ù§Ô∏è

I‚Äôm going to be teaching for the chair of the department at a university tomorrow. A little nerve racking. But something I‚Äôve wanted. But it‚Äôs like idk do I want it?  

And I am falling in love with this girl (I‚Äôm not out to my dad yet) and I‚Äôm like is she the one. Is she not?  Am I more of a partier than her or do I just need to take my own space? 

Thanks for the opportunity to rant.
You too!  Yah it‚Äôs just a crazy alternate to the reality that like ‚Äúshould‚Äù be?
Badass
Hell yah! I‚Äôm a makeup wearing lesbian too. Show off those colors and that glitter!  Gorgeous!
Cool hair! I would say depends on where you live and just building your next work up. I feel like a couple years ago I didn‚Äôt know anyone and then now I know a lot of lesbians.

I have dreams or flashbacks about my mom.  It‚Äôs tough.  It‚Äôs been 7 months.  I think grief is really isolating and his mom would love to hear from someone who cares just as much as she does.   

Good luck!! It‚Äôs not easy.
Totally agree. It also feels good just being able to vent. I feel like a lot of people just don‚Äôt know how it feels and how you can have so many ebbs and flows.
Yes
For sure.  Ugh. I think I‚Äôm going to end up craving them in January.  Merry Christmas!

Thanks! Needed to hear this. I lost my mom too this summer. We used to make peanut butter balls. They are bomb!!!!!! 

Ugh. Yah. Feel very alone today.
I still go over memories sometimes. It‚Äôs been 7 months. With time it‚Äôs just less but for me it hasn‚Äôt gone away.
This was the hardest for me. I talked a lot about what heaven was like and that I‚Äôd be okay.  You‚Äôve def made her proud and will continue to do so.
I am the same age gender and like same feelings. I try to be active and be around positive people. But it‚Äôs not easy
Yah I lost my mom almost 7 months ago... it‚Äôs tough
I still feel my mom with me after 6 months. I think it will last forever üòä
